description: Example VS Code MCP configuration for AMPEL360 Document Meta Enforcer

doc-meta-enforcer.description: AMPEL360 Document Control and Hyperlinking Server

mcpInstructions: For any new or heavily edited documentation file (.md, .rst, .txt, .adoc):
1. After drafting the content, call the MCP tool 'doc_control.enforce' with the full document text and file path
2. Replace the file content with the tool's output
3. The tool will add a Document Control block (authorship: AI prompted by Amedeo Pelliccia) if missing
4. The tool will convert standards/regulations to hyperlinks (EASA CS-25, FAA FAR 25, DO-178C, etc.)
5. The tool will link internal references (ATA chapters, requirements like RQ-XX-XX-XXX, OPT-IN axes)
